item.title: News: Arturia Collection X
item.description:
Overview

[Arturia] have just released V Collection X - A premium suite of software instruments for unparalleled sonic exploration; from evocative emulations and hybrid synth engines, to authentically modeled keyboards and beautifully captured acoustic sounds - enhanced for todayâ€™s production workflow.

Immerse yourself in an unparalleled music-making experience with iconic sounds and essential tools to suit your style, performance needs and production workflow. 39 instruments, 3 exclusive expansion packs, thousands of world-class presets - 1 canvas for infinite sonic exploration.

item.title: China syncs monkey brain with a computer
item.description:
Chinese researchers claim to have successfully conducted the “world’s first” brain-computer interface (BCI) experiment on a monkey

  • https://interestingengineering.com/science/china-syncs-monkey-brain-with-a-computer
